evaluate.from sentence: We evaluate our models on four datasets, using the code as available from our github codebase.
We also evaluate our models on the NER task similar to Miwa and Sasaki (2014) in the same dataset using 10-fold cross validation.

use.from sentence: We use the Adam optimizer (Kingma and Ba, 2015) and we fix the hyperparameters (i.e., alpha, dropout values, best epoch, learning rate) on the validation sets.
